attributes.action: charge a nominal fee for NHS bedblockers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A fee should be charged to those blocking beds in the NHS once found to be medically fit for discharge. This should be discretionary as some elderly folk have nowhere else to go, however, if this is due to family abandonment (as is sometimes the case), these families should be made to contribute towards their care.
